original_text: He was also angry with the three friends, because they had found no way to refute Job, and yet had condemned him.
korean_text: 또 세 친구에게 화를 냄은 그들이 능히 대답하지 못하면서도 욥을 정죄함이라

sentences.original_text: He was also angry with the three friends
because they had found no way to refute Job
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 욥을 반박할 방법을 찾지 못했기 때문이며
